agile[adj.灵活的,敏捷的]+ity性质,特性→n.敏捷, 活泼

co共同+agent[n.作用因素;代理人]→共同做的人

ag做,代理做+it+ate表动作→反复作→鼓动

sentences.cn: 政府特设机构制订国内航线和从一国飞往他国的国际航线.
sentences.en: Special government agencies regulate domestic airlines and those that fly into a country from other countries.

sentences.cn: 每个机构都有工作人员, 往往超过1000人.
sentences.en: Each agency has a staff, often more than 1,000 persons.

sentences.cn: 请记得将它寄回日本宇宙航空开发研究机构啊!

sentences.cn: 日本连年都有财政赤字而其债券也被评级机构降级.

sentences.cn: 管理机构有: 人力资源部 、 工程部 、 采购部 、 生产部 、 品控部.
sentences.en: Regulatory agencies are: human resources, engineering, purchasing department, department, quality control department.

sentences.cn: 国家数据保护机构是个小部门,权力有限.
sentences.en: National data protection agencies are small and have limited powers.

sentences.cn: 部分机构资金也参与其中.

sentences.cn: 一切促进变化和一切妨碍变化的力量都可以分别称为 “ 好”的或 “ 坏 ” 的.
sentences.en: All agencies that provoke change and all that retard it can be discribed as'good'or'bad'respectively.

sentences.cn: 使得在中国调查界成为中心资深力量.
sentences.en: All these equipments build Jiangnan Detective Agency the central force of the detective circle in China.

sentences.cn: 政府执行力是维系一个政府机构生存和发展的决定性力量.
sentences.en: Governmental executive ability is a crucial factor to maintain and develop a government agency.

sentences.cn: 虽然力量最为雄厚的机构进行了干预,也不能遏止恐慌抛售的狂潮.
sentences.en: The intervention of the most powerful agencies failed to stem the tide of panic sales.

sentences.cn: 外在的力量不能强制人们去改变他们的思考方式和信仰.
sentences.en: External agencies cannot force people to change how they think or what they believe.

sentences.cn: 真好象人力能够左右这庞大无比的力量似的.
sentences.en: It'seems as if human agency could affect this colossal power.
